import React from 'react'; import './styles/ItemModal.css'; const ItemModal = ({ item, closeModal }) => { if (!item) return null; return (
{item.ClothName || 'N/A'}
{item.Category || 'N/A'}
{item.subCategory || 'N/A'}
{item.Color || 'N/A'}
{item.Season || 'N/A'}
{item.Usage || 'N/A'}
Add Image
); }; export default ItemModal;
